RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 56. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS CHARLIE GRAS broke alertly, dueled in the run up the backstretch off the inside, continued to duel turn, roused left handed approaching the furlong grounds, drove clear then held the runner up safe late under continued firm hanling. SUNSHINE STAR in the second flight early along the inside, steered out when straightened for home, finished willingly to be well clear for the second spot. ALLSTAR MAGIC lacked speed, two path into the lane, improved into the lane in the two path, up for the show. MILA'S KAT in the second flight off the inside, came up empty for the drive. RESPOSADO last away, trailed most of the in failing to menace. ENOUGH HEART moved up to duel inside the winner, raced on equal terms with that one through the turn and into the stretch then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Resposado
ENTRY.OWNER: Elite Thoroughbred Racing LLC and Menard David
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed most of the way

ENTRY.NAME: Enough Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Sunshine Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight inside, steered out upper stretch, willingly,clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Allstar Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 2p into lane, improved, up show

ENTRY.NAME: Mila's Kat
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Charlie Gras
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, dueled off the inside, roused, kicked clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 5F Turf CR: 68. Claiming Purse 19000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS G G in the second group while racing off the inside, continued on the outside into the straight when called on for some run, responded well to win going away while remaining out in the course. COOL HOT CHIC maintained inside position in dueling up the backstraight closest to the inside, continued to alternate for the advantage through the turn, disposed of the other speed when straightened for home, clear past the furlong marker, proved no match for the winner late, went wrong after the wire, vanned off. JUST A WIN lacked early speed off the inside, moved toward the rail early in the turn, two path into the lane, lodged a late rally from between horses while too late for the top pair. HIGH ARABIAN outrun for three furlongs while four wide through the turn, also displayed some late energy while widest, not enough for the show. CRYPTO BRAVE went one paced throughout, lacked a closing punch. CHERRY STAR second flight inside, came out a bit to be in the two path entering the stretch, had little for the run to the wire. FUNKYLITTLESHACK dueled up front in the two path, gave way. SPLITTING ACES always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Cherry Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight inside, had little for the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Splitting Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: was always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Cool Hot Chic
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, shook clear, no match late, went wrong after wire

ENTRY.NAME: Funkylittleshack
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2p, gave way after three furlongs

ENTRY.NAME: Miss G G
ENTRY.OWNER: Guidry MD George Gary Guidry Ruth Delahoussaye Eddie and Delahoussaye Juanita
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd group off rail, asked upper, willingly, going away

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Dr. & Mrs. G. Gary Guidry & Mr. & Mrs. Eddie Delahoussaye

ENTRY.NAME: Just a Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed off rail, dropped in early turn, late rally show

ENTRY.NAME: Crypto Brave
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced, lacked late punch

ENTRY.NAME: High Arabian
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun outside, 4w turn, outkicked late 3rd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 58. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MARDI GRAS ALARM took control after the start, continued to show the way up the backstretch in the two path, edged clear into the turn, shrugged off a second foe into the lane, drew out steadily through the lane while kept to pressure. ANGEL AND ME last away along the inside, trailed early, steered out to be four wide when beginning to advance late turn, rallied for the place, no threat to the winner. CALIFORNIA CALI back off the early and the inside, began an early advance late backstretch, reached closest to the winner late in the turn, flattened out in the drive to be caught for the runner up position. JULIO CHOICE back off the early pace, advanced from between foes into the stretch, also saw progress stall the final furlong. MDA RUN ADDRESS behind the pace but within striking distance early, came up empty for the drive. RESPECT ALL dueled up front inside the winner early, began a steady retreat before three furlongs.

ENTRY.NAME: Angel and Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away inside, trailed, steered 4w late turn, rallied 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Respect All
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early inside, steady retreat

ENTRY.NAME: Mda Run Address
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind the early pace, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Julio Choice
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, advanced btwn foes into lane, stalled

ENTRY.NAME: California Cali
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off early pace, early advance outside, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Mardi Gras Alarm
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace 2p backstretch,edged clear, shrugged off foe

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 1M Turf CR: 91. Maiden Special Weight Purse 30000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LE GRIFFON with the pace from the start inside, narrowly showed the way onto the backstretch, allowed a rival the inside late backstretch, vied between rivals through the second turn and into the lane, edged clear inside the furlong marker, enough left to hold the runner up safe late. FIRST CLASS HARLOW four wide into the first turn, continued outside in mid pack up the backstretch, four wide through the second bend, rallied down the middle of the course, finished willingly to be closing the gap on the winner late, clear of the others. BOLT FROM ABOVE lacked early foot toward the inside, saved ground through the second turn, switched out for room nearing the furlong grounds, up late for the show, not a threat to the top pair. FREE RAMBLING MAN forwardly placed for a half, advanced and lodged an early rail bid with four furlongs to run, vied through the second bend hugging the rail, weakened in the drive. SONYA KNOWS BETTER pressed the winner from the outside, vied the middle half, held a narrow advantage in the second turn, also faltered in the drive. MARVINS' POSSE four wide in the first turn, stalked the lead pack the middle half, had little left for the stretch run as well. HE GOTS TO GO remained back in failing to menace. COMPUTERIZED was finished early, far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Le Griffon
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace, gave up rail, vied btwn, edged clear late, held

ENTRY.NAME: Bolt From Above
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, saved ground 2nd, switched out, up show

ENTRY.NAME: Computerized
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, far back

ENTRY.NAME: Sonya Knows Better
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed, brief lead, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Free Rambling Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, rail bid into far turn, vied inside, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: He Gots to Go
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in failing to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Marvins' Posse
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w 1st turn, stalked lead pack, little left

ENTRY.NAME: First Class Harlow
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w into first turn,mid pack middle half,4w 2nd turn,rally,gaining

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Purse 32000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 27, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden And Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MONAASIB outrun in the early going, advanced up the backstretch, challenged four wide second turn, took over into the lane, lost whip a furlong out while drifting in a bit, drew clear. FAHAN set the early pace off the inside, worked way to the rail while continuing to show the way, vied with the winner through upper stretch then proved no match, narrowly gained the nod for the place. RICKY BOBBY five wide through the first turn, raced forwardly up the backstretch, challenged three wide second turn and put a head in front, also raced on equal terms with the winner into the stretch, fell back, coming again for the runner up spot to miss. FATHER RED pressed the runner up off the inside, vied between horses through the second bend and began to weaken. SILENT POWER went one paced throughout in lacking a closing response. GUITARTUITION PLZZ broke back, failed to menace. ASHAAB last to leave, picked off a couple of tiring rivals while also not a threat. SEEHOSS finished early, failed to menace. GOLDEN QUALITY forwardly placed in the early going, began a steady retreat after half.

ENTRY.NAME: Guitartuition Plzz
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Ashaab
ENTRY.COMMENT: last to leave, picked off couple of tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Monaasib
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, 4w bid 2nd turn, took over, lost whip 1/8, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Quality
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed early, steady retreat

ENTRY.NAME: Silent Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced throughout in lacking a late bid

ENTRY.NAME: Seehoss
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Fahan
ENTRY.COMMENT: set the pace, worked way to rail, no match late, nod 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Ricky Bobby
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w 1st turn, forwardly placed, 3w bid 2nd, come back 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Father Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed off the inside, vied btwn second, weakened stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 5F Turf CR: 54. Maiden Claiming Purse 21000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIRE VISION with the pace from the start, vied three wide into the turn, put a head in front by late in the bend, clear when straightened for home, just enough left to contain the runner up at the wire. AVIE J last away, trailed while patiently handled, began to move on her courage late in the turn, swung six wide into the lane, finished willingly to be rapidly closing the gap on the winner late. RUN AWAY SAMARI within striking distance up the backstretch, chased the the leaders into the stretch, had little for the winner the final furlong, caught late for the place. DEBBO one paced to to three wide through the turn, lacked a winning kick. NICELY UNIFIED in mid pack along the inside, continued to save ground through the turn, came up empty the final furlong as well. NATURALBORNSENDER in the second flight outside, four wide into the turn, failed to muster a rally. LA VIE EN ROUGE broke back and failed to make an impact. TROSKA lacked speed, failed to muster a closing response. MARINA took control just after the start, dueled up front inside the winner through much of the turn then began to give way. REQUITE THE EFFORT in mid pack early, began a steady fade before three furlongs.

ENTRY.NAME: Avie J
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away,trailed for three furlongs,swung 5w into lane,willing

ENTRY.NAME: Marina
ENTRY.COMMENT: took control after the start, dueled turn inside, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Run Away Samari
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, chased leaders into lane, caught 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Debbo
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced, lacked winning kick

ENTRY.NAME: La Vie En Rouge
ENTRY.OWNER: Boutte Lynne M and Epstein Ellen
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, failed to make an impact

ENTRY.NAME: Nicely Unified
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack along the inside, saved ground into lane, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Fire Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace from start, 3w bid turn, clear, just held

ENTRY.NAME: Naturalbornsender
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, four wide into turn, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Troska
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, failed to muster a response

ENTRY.NAME: Requite the Effort
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack early, steady fade

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 5F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SASSY EMMA behind the lead group toward the inside for three furlongs, angled out to be four wide turning for home, outside bid past the furlong marker, edged clear. HEY MADALYN CLAIRE pressed the issue off the inside, vied between rivals through the turn, could no match strides with the winner late, edged away from the others. BITSY C C LIL GIRL forwardly placed, three wide through the turn with with the lead pack, weakened through the lane. MAGGIE'S RETURN back off the early pace after breaking back, floated out five wide by the winner turning for home, lacked a closing kick. JACKS RUN WILD last to leave, lacked speed, fanned six wide out of the turn, also came up mostly empty for the stretch run in improving only slightly. SUMMER IS HOT away in good order, cleared toward the inside, continued to contest the pace until less than a quarter remained and faltered. KLEINMEISTER finished early, trailed home.

ENTRY.NAME: Maggie's Return
ENTRY.OWNER: Haas Margaret Lanetta and Womack Larry D
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, floated 5w into lane, lacked kick

ENTRY.NAME: Sassy Emma
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind lead group, angled 4w into lane, bid, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Kleinmeister
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, trailed home

ENTRY.NAME: Jacks Run Wild
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, fanned 6w into the stretch, improved slightly

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Madalyn Claire
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed off the inside, vied btwn turn, outkicked late

ENTRY.NAME: Bitsy C C Lil Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, 3w bid thru turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Summer Is Hot
ENTRY.COMMENT: away in good order, cleared to the inside, vied, faltered stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 36000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR CLAIMING PRICE $20,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 27, 2023 All owed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PACIFICISLANDTIME behind the early leaders through the first turn toward the inside, continued to be outrun up the backstretch, swung out widest exiting the final turn, finished with good mettle to be up in a well timed ride. OAK HILL LG last to leave, trailed early as a result, pulled while three wide and between foes onto the backstretch, moved up to take control before a half, showed the way into and through the second turn, edged clear a furlong out, could not contain the winner. JEB'S LUCKY EIGHT four wide with within striking distance first turn, remained forward, pressed through the final bend and then chased the runner up past the furlong marker, had little more while comfortably finishing in front of the other two. FLASHING ANGELBABY set or forced the pace along the inside, weakened. HALF AGAIN pressed the issue in the two path for six furlongs, backed up through the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Flashing Angelbaby
ENTRY.COMMENT: set or forced pace inside, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Half Again
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed for six furlongs, backed up stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Pacificislandtime
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind leaders early, unhurried, swung widest, well timed

ENTRY.NAME: Oak Hill Lg
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed early 3w, early move, led, clear, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Jeb's Lucky Eight
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w first turn, forward, weakened final furlong

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 7F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 15500. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MAY 27, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 27, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Clai ming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: START WELL void of speed in trailing early, moved out, four wide through the turn, asked along late in the bend, closed with good energy to be in time. SHE'S MY PRIORITY forwardly placed off the inside out of the chute, chased the leader through the turn, reeled that one in with less than a furlong remaining, led late, could not contain the winner. BETISON broke sharp, was clear out of the gate, continued to maintain a daylight advantage through the turn, shortened inside the furlong grounds, caught in the late going. BEYOND D'ORO in the second flight off the inside, raced three wide through the turn, lacked a closing response. LAKE RUNNER in mid pack outside in the run up the backstretch, four wide into the turn, angled in toward the rail, went evenly to the wire. STORM BREACH lacked speed, failed to menace. CAJUN SHOTS remained back and did not threaten. KASEN'S SISTER chased the early leader up the backstretch, began to back up before a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Kasen's Sister
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, backed up

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Shots
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back, did not threaten

ENTRY.NAME: Start Well
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, moved outside, 4w into lane, full of run

ENTRY.NAME: Storm Breach
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Beyond d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 3w turn, lacked closing kick

ENTRY.NAME: She's My Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, chased, late bid, led, outkicked late

ENTRY.NAME: Betison
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, clear out of chute, stayed clear until late, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Lake Runner
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, moved inside turn, evenly drive
